ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] mid level armour questions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Ignorance. It didn t exist when I left Norrath and I am still getting my bearings...I used to practice safefall through Kithicor...:o) (Unless I am
ygData.messageBody:
>Is there a reason lambent armor is not included in your plans?


Ignorance. It didn't exist when I left Norrath and I am still getting my
bearings...I used to practice safefall through Kithicor...:o) (Unless I am
planning on being ain a given place for weeks I pretty much just stay bound
in Highpass and fade the run if I die, being a big chicken I don't die a
lot).

Sweet...thanks everybody, that is a ton of great info. I knew I needed
reality checks on some of the prices...but yeah, Lambent does seem to be the
thing to go after for some of the pieces...and the tips on how to go about
it totally rocks.

I see Guk, Soluseks Eye (yay! I looove that place) and fear/chain in my
future...

Tszaaz E'Taurguin, 26, Povar

P.S. I just found out that if you sing the words to Angstlich's Appalling
Screech you can make players run to zone as well, I just found them in the
library in Erudin..

*digs in pouch*

here they are

*clears throat*


"Do you beLIEVE in love after love...?"
